item.title: Typed Translations in Angular
item.description: TL/DR TBD translation Why translate? A lot of web applications are exposed to a target audience which likely constists of people who speak different languages. You can make your application easier to use if you translate it’s content (e.g. buttons, navigation, links, headers, etc.). Maintaining translation files is a pain Translations are typically managed through json files where one or more files are created for each language you want to support (e.
